mapper.insert: INSERT INTO documents (docs_num, title, content, empno, deptno, visibility, date) VALUES (#{docs_num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{empno}, #{deptno}, #{visibility}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT ds.share_id, d.docs_num, d.title, d.content, d.empno, d.deptno, e.ename, dp.dname FROM documents d INNER JOIN docs_shared ds ON d.docs_num = ds.docs_num INNER JOIN emp e ON d.empno = e.empno INNER JOIN dept dp ON d.deptno = dp.deptno WHERE ds.deptno = #{deptno}
SELECT d.docs_num, d.title, d.content, d.date, e.ename, dp.dname FROM documents d INNER JOIN emp e ON d.empno = e.empno INNER JOIN dept dp ON d.deptno = dp.deptno WHERE d.docs_num = #{docs_num}
